channel.title: CVE Feed for RoboSoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RoboSoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-27620|2024-08-02T12:16:36.479Z -- robosoft -- photo%20gallery%2C%20images%2C%20slider%20in%20rbs%20image%20gallery
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in RoboSoft Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin <= 3.2.12 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-24414|2024-08-02T10:56:03.648Z -- robosoft -- photo%20gallery%2C%20images%2C%20slider%20in%20rbs%20image%20gallery
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RoboSoft Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin <= 3.2.11 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-3894|2024-08-01T20:26:57.019Z -- robosoft -- photo%20gallery%2C%20images%2C%20slider%20in%20rbs%20image%20gallery
item.description: The Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via an Image Title in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-3896|2024-08-01T20:26:57.065Z -- robosoft -- photo%20gallery%2C%20images%2C%20slider%20in%20rbs%20image%20gallery
item.description: The Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the the Gallery title field in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the the Gallery title field in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. item.description: The Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via an Image Title in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-34382|2024-05-06T17:57:27.409Z -- robosoft -- robo%20gallery
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in RoboSoft Robo Gallery.This issue affects Robo Gallery: from n/a through 3.2.18.

item.title: CVE-2024-5343|2024-06-19T05:37:42.737Z -- robosoft -- photo%20gallery%2C%20images%2C%20slider%20in%20rbs%20image%20gallery
item.description: The Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.19. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the 'rbs_ajax_create_article' and 'rbs_ajax_reset_views' functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to create new posts and reset gallery view counts via a forged request granted they can trick a Contributor+ level user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-5343|2024-06-20T15:29:58.722Z -- robosoft -- photo%20gallery%2C%20images%2C%20slider%20in%20rbs%20image%20gallery
item.description: The Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.19. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to create new posts and reset gallery view counts via a forged request granted they can trick a Contributor+ level user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-5343|2024-08-01T21:11:12.439Z -- robosoft -- photo%20gallery%2C%20images%2C%20slider%20in%20rbs%20image%20gallery
item.description: The Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.19. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the 'rbs_ajax_create_article' and 'rbs_ajax_reset_views' functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to create new posts and reset gallery view counts via a forged request granted they can trick a Contributor+ level user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
